version_description:
▸ You can now sell multiple Tactics at the same time! (1, 10 or 50)
▸ Ranking system: some rare but still problematic issues have been fixed (ex: World Number Ones with 20k points should no longer exist... :) )
▸ Many technical optimizations, fixing some crashes and bugs on some devices (particularly low/mid-end devices)

As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ You can now sell your unused Tactics for Cash!
▸ New MTF Tournaments: Miami & Indian Wells
▸ iMessage: get your first Top Seed stickers! (we start with 6 only, but will add more soon)
▸ New countries: Ivory Coast, Iraq
▸ Various bug fixes & optimizations.

As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ Tie breaks in the final set have been removed from Major tournaments (except the American Open)
▸ MTF500 tournaments' difficulty has been rebalanced. Top players should find them a bit more challenging now!
▸ New customization items: tennis cap! (backward & forward)
▸ Some opponents have been updated (portrait + potential) to match their performance in the real world!
▸ Staff & Training menus are a bit more polished now

As always, thank you all for your support and feedback! <3

▸ You can now sell multiple Tactics at the same time! (1, 10 or 50)
▸ Ranking system: some rare but still problematic issues have been fixed (ex: World Number Ones with 20k points should no longer exist... :) )
▸ Many technical optimizations, fixing some crashes and bugs on some devices (particularly low/mid-end devices)

As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ Glorious Mondays: match rewards are now doubled every monday (for 24 hours). For a flying start of the week!
▸ Each weekend, discounts on Staff or Trainings will be available.
▸ From time to time, top-notch tactics bags will be on sale for a limited time. Stay tuned!
▸ Various bug fixes & optimizations.

As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ Final Set: both players can now pick additional Tactics to seal the victory!
▸ Follow us on Instagram and win #topseed Bags. $$$
▸ Some interfaces are a little more polished now (Portrait Customization, Hitting Partners).
▸ 2 new languages! Japanese and Korean!!
▸ Various bug fixes & optimizations.

As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ Final Set: both players can now pick additional Tactics to seal the victory!
▸ Follow us on Instagram and win #topseed Bags. $$$
▸ Some interfaces are a little more polished now (Portrait Customization, Hitting Partners).
▸ 2 new languages! Japanese and Korean!!
▸ Various bug fixes & optimizations.

As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ Tournament stadiums have been visually improved, including more details and surface colors (and many more to come!)
▸ Training courts have their own style and ambience!
▸ Players are now always dressed in white at Wimbledon
▸ Many technical optimizations, fixing some crashes and bugs on some devices (particularly low/mid-end devices)

As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ Tournament stadiums have been visually improved, including more details and surface colors (and many more to come!)
▸ Training courts have their own style and ambience!
▸ Players are now always dressed in white at Wimbledon
▸ Many technical optimizations, fixing some crashes and bugs on some devices (particularly low/mid-end devices)
As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ TOP EVENT - *AMERICAN STARS* : during the US Open, participate in a unique vintage tournament. Face American tennis legends of the 80s & 90s, defeat them all and earn unique rewards!
▸ Various bug fixes & optimizations.

As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

! TOP UPDATE !
▸ Weekend Events: from now on, 2-day special tournaments will be available every weekend! A great way to have fun while getting additional cash!
▸ Upcoming Events: Legends in the Sky, Street Tennis, Tennis of the Future, Pixel Cup...
▸ Event Tickets can now be found in Tennis Bags (+ after matches) throughout the week!
▸ Bug fixes & optimizations.

As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

! TOP UPDATE !
▸ Weekend Events: from now on, 2-day special tournaments will be available every weekend! A great way to have fun while getting additional cash!
▸ Upcoming Events: Legends in the Sky, Street Tennis, Tennis of the Future, Pixel Cup...
▸ Event Tickets can now be found in Tennis Bags (+ after matches) throughout the week!
▸ Bug fixes & optimizations.

As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

! TOP UPDATE !
▸ Weekend Events: from now on, 2-day special tournaments will be available every weekend! A great way to have fun while getting additional cash!
▸ Upcoming Events: Legends in the Sky, Street Tennis, Tennis of the Future, Pixel Cup...
▸ Event Tickets can now be found in Tennis Bags (+ after matches) throughout the week!
▸ Bug fixes & optimizations.

As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

CHRISTMAS CUP: for 2 weeks, participate in a unique winter tournament. Face Santa Claus and his elves, become the King in the North and earn unique rewards!

Thank you all for your support and feedback!
And Merry Christmas guys! <3
See you in 2019 for amazing new features and events! (the Australian Open is coming soon)

▸ Bug fixes & optimizations.
As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ SPECIAL TOURNAMENT: AUSTRALIAN LEGENDS
▸ During the Australian Open 2019, we shall travel back in time! Come participate in “black-and-white” tournaments and face Australian Glories of the Past!
▸ Earn cool stuff including new achievements, customization items (from the 50s to the 70s) and even legendary Tactics...
▸ Have fun guys!

▸ Bug fixes & optimizations.
As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3
